nodes.text: Holo-Sec Corp was a company that produced and patented an explosive device used in conjunction with a holographic security system. This particular explosive device was the Holo-Sec Corp anti-theft explosive.

In 3956 BBY, a friend of Gilthos Uksaris, band manager of the Twisted Rancor Trio, delivered a package of 50 credits and a suit of Echani fiber armor to him at an apartment in the Lower City of Taris. He sought to secure this package from theft using the security system manufactured by this company.
